review_data.title: Down Home Food in the Rougher Part of Town
review_data.content: If you want solid, perfectly prepared Swiss comfort food, you won't be disappointed there. They also serve horse steak for those who are curious to try (not my thing). Prices are fair and the service was nice. I personally recommend the Zuercher Geschnetzeltes.
